title: A Fully Furnished Bedroom with AC, In House W/D laundry
posting_body: --- A furnished bedroom with AC in a beautifully renovated 4BR/3BR Apartment.
Sharing one full bathroom with another apartment roommate, while sharing spatial kitchen and living area with other 3 apartment roommates;
--- With Washing and Dryer machines inside the house; Quiet and clean neighborhood.
--- The location is ideal for easy and relaxed daily life:
1) 5 minutes' walk to Cambridge side Gallery shopping mall;
2) 3 minutes' walk to Twin city plaza for grocery, supermarket, Dunken Donuts, Mcdonalds;
3) 5 minutes' walk to Greenline Lechmere T, 10 minutes' walk to Kendall Sq Redline T.
